amendment.description: To include Alaska Native organizations in consultations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2225 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2225 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Lankford. (consideration: CR S1973; text: CR S1973) To include Alaska Native organizations in consultations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2225 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Lankford.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2225 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
